description:
Trees at rear of cemetery. 

 1.   Large Multi-Stemmed Plane: 

      Remove low branches overhanging adjacent site to height      of 15m. removing only those branches of 30mm diameter      or less.  Do not remove any of the upright spires of      150mm in diameter.  Remove deadwood. 

 2.   Second Large Plane: 

      Remove low branches to a height of 15m. removing only      those branches of 30mm diameter or less.  Do not remove      any of the upright spires of 150mm in diameter.      Deadwood. 

 3.   Maple: 

      Remove low branches to a height of 15m. cutting back to      side laterals where appropriate, deadwood.
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE 

 The consent of the tree owner should be obtained prior to commencing works.
